column4: Yea, i've been in for about a year, and I really haven't done anything too tough. I set up a virtual machine, recompiled the kernel, and installed a few things from source. not too tough
I was wondering, is it possible to transfer some of my Kernel files to a flash drive, so that my computer can only boot if the drive is plugged in?
theres secure, theres paranoid. and then theres Tin-Foil-Hat Paranoid. :)
